If you’re talking about the ‘prepare to fight for your life’ part, then all you have to do is search for it and remove it if you wanted to remove it…[/quote]

Here i edited it, It’s the jad speaking part, i need it so it stays, and doesn’t disappear after the player teleports.

item.title: Teleporting Help [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

I made the trollheim teleport, teleport me to Jad’s Cave/Cavern, whatever it’s called. But This happens:

Sorry, I think I should be more specific. The jad speaking part is my problem, after i teleport, the jad speaking disappears, and I need it to stay, and I don’t know how i would add a timer for it, so it stays.

video here

click this

The code i added it:

case 29031: //Jad Teleport c.triggerTele(2413, 5116, 0); c.sendFrame200(4901, 591); c.sendFrame126("", 4902); c.sendFrame126("", 4903); c.sendFrame126("You have been teleported to Jad's Cave!", 4904); c.sendFrame126("Prepare to fight for your life!", 4905); c.sendFrame126("", 4906); c.sendFrame75(2617, 4901); c.sendFrame164(4900); break;

This is my Trollheim teleport.

Read full topic
